mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lightning_meeting ( meeting_name, # meeting_description, recruitment_end_time, start_time, end_time, min_person_num, max_person_num, organizer_id, meeting_type, latitude, longitude ) VALUES ( #{meetingName}, #{recruitmentEndTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{minPersonNum}, #{maxPersonNum}, #{organizerId}, #{meetingType}, #{latitude}, #{longitude} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lightning_meeting SET meeting_name = #{meetingName}, recruitment_end_time = #{recruitmentEndTime}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, min_person_num = #{minPersonNum}, max_person_num = #{maxPersonNum}, organizer_id = #{organizerId}, meeting_type = #{meetingType}, status = #{status}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lightning_meeting WHERE status = 'SUCCESS' AND start_time BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE)
SELECT * FROM lightning_meeting WHERE status = 'OPEN' AND notification_sent = FALSE AND recruitment_end_time <= #{now}
mapper.update: UPDATE lightning_meeting SET status = 'CANCELLED' WHERE start_time <= #{now} AND status != 'SUCCESS'
